Module: measures

Methods

(inner) measures(meter, measures, builder) → {Score}

Parse masures using a time meter to get a sequence

Parameters:
Name Type Description
meter String

the time meter
measures String

the measures string
builder function

(Optional) the function used to build the notes
Source:
  • measures.js, line 16
Returns:

the score object

Type
Score
Example
measures('4/4', 'c d (e f) | g | (a b c) d')
